thread.title: Panama Relocation Tours Announces Special Discounts On Their October 31st Tour
thread.title_full: Panama Relocation Tours Announces Special Discounts On Their October 31st Tour

author: prbuzz.com
title: Panama Relocation Tours Announces Special Discounts On Their October 31st Tour
text:
More people are now moving to Panama from around the world. With the low cost of living and the better quality of life, Panama has become a place for people to retire to and young couples to start a new life together. Panama Tours has now announced special discounts on their October 31st Tour for people wishing to explore Panama to see what the country has to offer.
Panama Relocation Tours has today announced they have launched a special offer for their October 31st Tour of Panama. Jackie Lange from the leading Panama Relocation Tour company has said her company is offering a discount of a $100 per person for people who book a place on the October tour before the 31st August 2015. A spokesman for the company has said these places will go quickly as there are only seven seats on the tour available.
The leading Panama relocation tour company is not only offering a discount on the tour, but they are also offering other discounts to make the October 31st Panama Tour even more affordable. These special offers include: saving 25% on airfare with Copa Airlines, and 50% discount on the popular Hilton hotel in Panama City.
The Panama Relocation Tours give people the chance to experience what Panama has to offer and to see for themselves how they can live a more comfortable life. The company has become the most recommended Panama relocation tour company, which is down to the quality of the tour, the expert advice they offer and the affordability of the tour. People who attend the tour will get a chance to visit key areas in Panama such as Panama City, Coronado/Gorgona, Santa Clara, Las Tablas, Santiago, Volcan and many more. These are popular places where expats live.
Jackie Lange from Panama Relocation Tours Said: “By booking by the 31st August 2015, people wishing to learn more about Panama can enjoy the discounts we have on offer. We are offering a huge discount of $100 per person for the tour as well as the other discounts available.”
By taking up the discounted offer by booking before the 31st August 2015, people save money as well as seeing why so many people move from the UK, America, and Canada to Panama. The country offers people more for their money when it comes to buying or renting a property, as well as offering a better lifestyle.
For more details on different Panama Relocation Tours and what they include, please visit http://panamarelocationtours.com/tours
About Panama Relocation Tours Inc.
The company's owner Jackie Large has lived in 4 countries moved 22 times and visited 26 countries. She has plenty of great experience in relocating to a foreign country. She and her husband discovered the hidden gem of Panama.
Company name - Panama Relocation Tours, Inc.
Media Contact - Jackie Lange This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. 972-496-4500
